Sentencas: The use of a high temperature fuel cell (HTFC) to continuously and simultaneously polygenerate hydrogen in combination with electricity and heat represents a promising technology as a source of fuel for fuel cell vehicles.
Titulo: Conceptual design and configuration performance analyses of polygenerating high temperature fuel cells

Sentencas: Different configurations of polygenerating HTFC, including different designs with internal and external reforming are options to polygenerate electricity, hydrogen and heat.
Titulo: Conceptual design and configuration performance analyses of polygenerating high temperature fuel cells

Sentencas: The current study analyzes and compares six different configurations based on solid oxide technology.
Titulo: Conceptual design and configuration performance analyses of polygenerating high temperature fuel cells

Sentencas: Efficiency results based upon the Supplemental Input Method demonstrate that internal reforming configurations achieve higher performance than when hydrogen product is produced in an external reformer.
Titulo: Conceptual design and configuration performance analyses of polygenerating high temperature fuel cells

Sentencas: The overall efficiency and the efficiency in the generation of each product are used as the basis for comparison.
Titulo: Conceptual design and configuration performance analyses of polygenerating high temperature fuel cells
